page.shortlink: ux viewbox builder viewbox properties allow deselect
page.description: If only one item is selected and the user clicks on that item, should the item be de-selected?

discussion.p: The *[ui:Allow de-select]* property lets the user deselect the current selected item in a ViewBox with *[ui:Allow NULL selection]* enabled. Users can tap or click the selected item to de-select it when this property is turned on.
This property is shown when [Allow NULL selection] is enabled.
